Estimate tree volume in Manitoba using Kozak (1988) form with Klos (2004) parameters

vol_klos2007.Rd

Estimate tree volume in Manitoba using Kozak (1988) form with Klos (2004) parameters

Usage

vol_klos2007(DBH, height, species, subregion = "Province")

Arguments

DBH

Numeric vector. Diameter at breast height (cm).

height

Numeric vector. Total height (m).

species

Character vector. Species code (e.g., "PICE.MAR").

subregion

Optional Ecozone or Ecoregion identifier

References

Klos, R. J., Wang, G. G., Dang, Q.-L., & East, E. W. (2007). Taper equations for five major commercial tree species in Manitoba, Canada. Western Journal of Applied Forestry, 22(3), 163–170.

Kozak, A. (1988). A variable-exponent taper equation. Canadian Journal of Forest Research, 18, 1363–1368.
